projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: A responsive portfolio website built with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript, featuring custom web components and modern CSS features. This project demonstrates modern web development practices and responsive design principles.

projects.title: CSE 134B Course Projects
projects.description: Advanced web development projects including responsive design, accessibility features, and modern web APIs. Collaborated with team members to implement complex features while maintaining code quality.

projects.title: Philosophy Thesis - Plato's View on Women
projects.alt: Ancient Greek philosophy books and scrolls
projects.description: Comprehensive research paper analyzing Plato's perspective on women in classical philosophy. Examined Republic and Laws to understand his progressive yet contradictory views on gender equality.

projects.title: Academic Research Platform
projects.description: Developed a platform for academic research collaboration with real-time data visualization and interactive features. Implemented responsive charts and collaborative tools for research teams.

projects.title: Green Theme Design System
projects.alt: Color palette and design system components
projects.description: Created a comprehensive design system using CSS variables and modern design principles. Features accessible color schemes and responsive components for consistent user experience.
